      Adds a new customer to the DB and refreshes the list used by the customer menu to add the customer created by the menu into the database

      Deletes an Appointment in the DB and refreshes the list at the specific time frame used by the main menu appointment deletion thread after the deletion was confirmed

      Deletes all appointments from the DB by the customer ID Number used by the customer side of the main menu to delete any appointments a customer has before customer deletion

      Populates Customer List from DB runs every time customer table modification runs after division list is updated to match the division with the customer also runs whenever a customer is added/updated/or deleted to fill in the customer table

    • Method Detail

      • verifyUser

        public boolean verifyUser(java.lang.String User,
                          java.lang.String Pass)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        VerifyUser checks database for user and saves UserID and UserLogin used by login menu to check user password match

        Used by Login_MenuContoller.Login_Action to check user and password from the login form

        Parameters:
        User - user to send to database to retrive the password
        Pass - checks the password and compare with retrived password
        Returns:
        true if login passes and false if login fails
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws if connection to Database fails

      • updateCountriesList

        public void updateCountriesList()
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Populates Country List from DB runs once runs after sucessfull login to fill in the countries list
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if connection to database fails

                         throws java.sql.SQLException

      • updateCustomerList

        public void updateCustomerList()
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Populates Customer List from DB runs every time customer table modification runs after division list is updated to match the division with the customer also runs whenever a customer is added/updated/or deleted to fill in the customer table
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if connection to database fails

      • updateAppointmentListByStart

        public void updateAppointmentListByStart(java.lang.String timeStart,
                                         java.lang.String timeEnd)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        update appointment list within a specific time frame used by the main menu controller to see if an appointment is within 15 minutes of login time
        Parameters:
        timeStart - the time appointments have to be after
        timeEnd - the time appointments have to be before
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if connection to database fails

      • getAppointmentList

                                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        ability to check if any appoitments in time used by the appointment menu to pull all appointments the same day as a new one to check for overlap
        Parameters:
        timeStart - the time appointments have to be after
        timeEnd - the time appointments have to be before
        Returns:
        the number of appointments in the range
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if connection to database fails
